'''Blazing Dadaupa''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to set a [[Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl]]'s shield on fire.

==Trivia==
* Dadaupa in [[Hilichurlian]] means "large mountain" according to the [[Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian]], and the name is shared with [[Dadaupa Gorge]]. Thus, the achievement's name could be translated to "Blazing Large Mountain" in Hilichurlian.
